ygData.subject: Re: Stupid Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I dont know if I was replying to you or someone else, but they made it sound like Infra was barely better than human vision.  Thats pretty far off.  If you
ygData.messageBody:
I dont know if I was replying to you or someone else, but they made it
sound like Infra was barely better than human vision. Thats pretty far
off. If you have a Greater light stone and some flashing song,
obviously that helps the human vision... Actually the darkest place I
know is the tunnel into Guk in Innothule, though I never went into the
arena tunnel with a human... In the guk tunnel I turned my brightness
all the way up on my monitor and still could only see people's names.
Needless to say the troll there had a pretty fun time, guiding me to the
guk zone. ("Turn lef! lef!" "No rit! rit!")
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
